cast.name: 玛丽亚·费利克斯 María Félix
米格尔·安热尔·费里 Miguel Ángel Ferriz
多明戈·索莱尔 Domingo Soler
路易斯·阿瑟维斯·卡斯坦尼达 Luis Aceves Castañeda

writer.name: 路易斯·布努艾尔 Luis Buñuel

director.name: 路易斯·布努艾尔 Luis Buñuel

this_title: La fièvre monte à El Pao
introduction: In the fictitious island of Ojeda, people lives a dictatorship and the island is a penal colony with ordinary and political prisoners together. When the Governor Mariano Vargas is murdered by a sniper, his idealistic secretary Ramón Vázquez is assigned director of security in charge of the prison. Vázquez is in love with the widow Inés Rojas and they have a love affair. But when the new governor Alejandro Gual Miguel arrives in the island, he wants Inés to be his lover. Further he forces the killer to sign a false confession telling that Vázquez is the responsible for the attempt against the previous governor and blackmails Inés. But Inés is a female fatale that knows the political games and manipulations.
foreign_title: La fièvre monte à El Pao
